name: AirWatch
overview:
Founded in 2003 by proven experts in wireless technology, AirWatch is a leading provider of enterprise-wide Mobile Device and WLAN Management solutions.

The AirWatch solution tracks, monitors and manages your organization’s entire fleet of mobile devices as well as the people who use them. Web-based, functionally robust and easy to use, AirWatch provides today’s corporate IT departments and help desks with a single, integrated, real-time view across their WLAN and cellular networks of all their deployed mobile devices, regardless of manufacturer, operating system,location or status.

Headquartered in Atlanta, Ga., the company has more than 3,000 customers across the distribution/logistics, field service, government, healthcare, hospitality, manufacturing and retail industries. These 3,000customers represent more than 6,000 unique locations equipped with over 20,000 access points, and collectively established 20 million individual Internet sessions annually.
